SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED"
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr
The postal address used to locate the clinician or coroner at the time of death certification. The element is required if the death has been certified.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: OID TBD Certifier Types)
A coded value that indicates the role played by the person certifying the death. E.g., coroner, physician.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This assignedPerson SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name
This field is valued with the person who signed the death certificate. The full name of the certifier is required. A value is required if the case has not been assigned to a coroner/medical examiner.
